DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the intraocular pressure-lowering effect and safety of Bimatoprost SR compared with selective laser trabeculoplasty in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension who are not adequately managed with topical IOP-lowering medication.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Bimatoprost SR to Selective Laser Trabeculoplasty in Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of either OpenAngle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension in each eye that require IOP lowering treatment. Eye surgery (including cataract surgery) and or eye laser surgery within the past 6 months. Enrollment in other studies using Bimatoprost SR.
